sentences.en: a guide to the best education-related sites on the Web
sentences.cn: 最佳教育类网站指南

sentences.en: A spider had spun a perfect web outside the window.
sentences.cn: 蜘蛛在窗外结了一张完整的网。

sentences.en: A spider spins a web in which it catches insects and bugs for its food.
sentences.cn: 蜘蛛结网,用于捕捉各种昆虫.

sentences.en: a tangled web of relationships
sentences.cn: 复杂的关系

sentences.en: a web of streets
sentences.cn: 纵横交错的街道

sentences.en: He watched a spider spinning its web.
sentences.cn: 他观察一只蜘蛛织网。

sentences.en: His tactics were to entangle the opposition in a web of parliamentary procedure.
sentences.cn: 他的策略是使反对派陷入错综复杂的议会程序之中。

sentences.en: In your Web browser's cache are the most recent Web files that you have downloaded.
sentences.cn: 网页浏览器的高速缓存区里有你最近下载的网页文件。

sentences.en: Log on to the Hammer Web ring, with 12 more sites devoted to macabre movies.
sentences.cn: 登录哈默网络联盟，就会找到另外12个专门播放恐怖电影的网站。

sentences.en: Relationships are often a tangled web at the best of times.
sentences.cn: 即使在最好的情况下，关系也是错综复杂的。

sentences.en: the geometry of a spider's web
sentences.cn: 蜘蛛网的几何形状

sentences.en: The spider must wait for prey to be ensnared on its web.
sentences.cn: 蜘蛛必须等待猎物被它的蛛网困住。

sentences.en: The tiger was enmeshed in the web laid by hunter.
sentences.cn: 老虎缠在猎人布下的网里.

sentences.en: There's also 5Mb of webspace so that you can create your own personal web site.
sentences.cn: 还有5兆的网络空间，你可以建立你的个人网站。

sentences.en: to be caught in a spider's web of confusion
sentences.cn: 陷入混乱不堪的局面

sentences.en: We learned how to create and register a new web page.
sentences.cn: 我们学会了新网页的制作和注册方法。

sentences.en: We were caught in a tangled web of relationships.
sentences.cn: 我们陷入了错综复杂的人际关系网络。

sentences.en: When text is saved from a Web page, it is often very badly formatted with many short lines.
sentences.cn: 从网页上转存文本时，往往会出现许多短行，格式也乱了。

sentences.en: Wizards and templates can help you create brochures, calendars, and Web pages.
sentences.cn: 向导程序和模板可以帮助你创建手册、日历和网页。

sentences.en: Yahoo is the oldest and best-known Web directory service.
sentences.cn: 雅虎是最早且最知名的因特网目录服务网站。

words.tran_cn: 网客；活跃在网络上的人
带子，边带；结实的带状织物；厚边；熔塌
用蹼将…连接；结网；使落入圈套（web的过去分词）
包围,环绕,设陷阱,使陷罗网

phrases.tran_cn: 食物网，食物链；食物循环
永远完成不了的工作；拖延策略
卷筒纸印刷机；轮转印刷机

trans.tran_en: the system on the Internet that allows you to find and use information that is held on computers all over the world
